text: Vincent Lepvraud (born 28 July 1970) is a French rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Niort Category:Sportspeople from Deux-Sèvres
title: Vincent Lepvraud
